content: **garland autumn 2024 is the result of the collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **size ** 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 **measurements ** finished chest fullest point circumference 96 5 104 114 120 130 5 140 5 151 5 159 170 5 cm / 38 41 45 48 51½ 55¼ 59¾ 62½ 67¼ to be worn with 16-22 cm / 6¼ 8¾ positive ease model has a 86 5cm / 34 chest circumference and is wearing a size 2 **materials ** garland hobbii x pom pom 70% cotton 30% alpaca 105m / 114yd per 50 g shade heart of glass 9 10 10 11 12 13 14 14 16 17 skeins **needles ** 4mm / us 6 circular needle 60-80cm / 24-32 length and needles of choice suitable for working small circumference in the round 3mm / us 3 needles of choice suitable for working small circumference in the round 3 5mm / us 4 circular needle 40-60cm / 16-24 length always use a needle size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **gauge ** 20 sts & 28 row = 10cm / 4 over st st pattern on 4mm / us 6 needles after blocking 21 sts & 36 row = 10cm / 4 over garter st pattern on 4mm / us 6 needles after blocking 22 sts & 38 row = 10cm / 4 over garter st pattern on 3 5mm / us 4 needles after blocking 23 sts & 42 row = 10cm / 4 over garter st pattern on 3mm / us 3 needles after blocking **pattern information ** adorned is worked from the top down knit in the round in one piece starting at the neckline increases are worked throughout the yoke until the upper body is completed the yoke is then separated into lower body and sleeves and each part is worked separately in the round **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2
